entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
